title: Zamboburger with original Zambos Plantains
ingredients: 6 ounces of shredded or ground pork butt
Seasoned with salt and pepper to taste
1 family-sized bag of Original Zambos Plantains
instructions: Step 1. Place the meat in a bowl with the aforementioned spices: garlic, cumin, oregano, salt, pepper, black sauce, and cilantro. Mix well.
Step 3. Place oil in a pan and cook the patty to your desired doneness.
Step 4. Spread ketchup on one of the slices of bread.
Step 5. Add lettuce to taste. Place a portion of Zambos Plantain Originals, then top with the avocado, meat, and cheese. Serve.
